ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and then We would have cut off his life-blood
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and then severed his life vein;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then would have cut off his heart’s artery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And then We certainly would have cut off Al-Watin from him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We would certainly have cut off his aorta.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then We would surely have cut his life-vein
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and would indeed have cut his life-vein,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and then cut off his aorta,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We should certainly then cut off the artery of his heart:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And then certainly should have cut off his life artery (Aorta),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then, We would surely have cut from him the aorta (vein)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:46] then We would have assuredly severed his life-artery, the aorta of the heart, a vein that connects with it, and which if severed results in that person’s death,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And then severed his life artery) the life artery of Muhammad (pbuh)
